text: Dangerously in Love 2 Singel Beyoncé from the album Dangerously in Love Released 2003r. Genre R&B;/Soul Length 4:53 Label Columbia Writer Beyoncé Knowles, Errol McCalla Jr. Producer Beyoncé Knowles, Errol "Poppi" McCalla Jr. Beyoncé singles chronology Summertime (2004r.) Dangerously in Love 2 Naughty Girl (2004r.) Dangerously in Love track listing The Closer I Get to You (11) Dangerously in Love 2 (12) Beyoncé Interlude (13) Knowles re-recorded the song for her debut solo album, Dangerously in Love (2003), under the title "Dangerously in Love 2". Featuring a modified arrangement and background vocals by Kelly Rowland and Michelle Williams, Knowles's version received a generally positive response from music critics. In the U.S. the song went for radio airplay only and was never released as a single in other countries. No music video exists for the song, though the performance on her DVD Live at Wembley was shown frequently on BET. Knowles frequently performed the song live — often as a prelude to "Crazy in Love" or her live cover of the Jill Scott song "He Loves Me". She performed "Dangerously in Love 2" at the 2004 Grammy Awards, where it won in the category of "Best Female R&B; Vocal Performance". Other versions of the Knowles solo version of the song include an a cappella, an instrumental and the Svella remix. == Charts == Chart (2004) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot 100 57 U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 17 Category:Beyoncé songs Category:2003 songs
title: Dangerously in Love 2
